exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a : A l : list A IHl : permutation l (flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) (frequency_list l)) Unable to unify "permutation (?M1448 :: flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) ?M1449) (flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) (add_frequency_list ?M1448 ?M1449))" with "permutation (a :: l) (flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) (add_frequency_list a (frequency_list l)))".
